summary: Blocking: marker file missing and repo still on main, so the feature/publish-repo audit cannot proceed; branch notebooks are absent.

issues.root_cause: The retrospective marker docs/self-improvement/markers/feature-review-feature-publish-repo.json is absent, so the audit lacks a timestamp and pointers to the correct plan/progress notebooks.
issues.mitigation: Restore or regenerate the marker (e.g., rerun make turn_end on the main branch workflow or recover it from history) before reattempting the audit.
issues.prevention: Add checks that fail turn_end or session wrap when the expected marker file is missing or untracked, ensuring markers remain committed.
issues.evidence: cat docs/self-improvement/markers/feature-review-feature-publish-repo.json -> No such file or directory; find . -name 'feature-publish-repo.json' returned no results.

issues.root_cause: Repository remains on main instead of the target feature/publish-repo branch, so branch-specific state (plan/progress, diffs) is unavailable.
issues.mitigation: Checkout feature/publish-repo (or the slug used for the review branch) before gathering audit evidence.
issues.prevention: Update the bootstrap/guard scripts to assert the expected branch before audits begin.

issues.root_cause: No branch-specific plan or progress notebooks exist under docs/plans/ or docs/progress/, leaving the audit without recorded objectives or logs.
issues.mitigation: Recreate docs/plans/feature-publish-repo.md and docs/progress/feature-publish-repo.md (or the review-branch equivalents) with the latest updates before rerunning the audit.
issues.prevention: Ensure make bootstrap/start_session always commits the branch notebooks and add CI guards to block when they are absent.
issues.evidence: ls docs/plans -> README.md; ls docs/progress -> README.md (no feature/publish-repo notebooks present).

follow_ups: Restore the missing marker file for feature/publish-repo and capture its timestamp.
Checkout the feature/publish-repo branch before collecting retrospective evidence.
Recreate and update the branch plan/progress notebooks so the audit has context.
